original_text: Now the name of the man was Nabal, and the name of his wife Abigail. The woman was discerning and beautiful, but the man was harsh and badly behaved; he was a Calebite.
korean_text: 그 사람의 이름은 나발이요 그의 아내의 이름은 아비가일이라 그 여자는 총명하고 용모가 아름다우나 남자는 완고하고 행실이 악하며 그는 갈렙 족속이었더라

sentences.original_text: Now the name of the man was Nabal
and the name of his wife Abigail
The woman was discerning and beautiful
but the man was harsh and badly behaved
